backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with contact form submissions, public contact info, and user profile management guarded by access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend React file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and base styles defining light/dark mode colors and design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring together all sections and handling smooth scrolling navigation via refs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with quick links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution including dynamic year and hostname-based UTM.
frontend/src/components/GradientButton.t: Reusable gradient-styled button wrapper extending the base Button component.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Displays an about section with a company intro, image, and three feature cards, including a Learn More button callback.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClientR: Shows client result graphics and a CTA card, using a list of images mapped into cards and a callback button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form with state handling, form submission via a custom hook, and contact info cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders a full-screen hero section with headline, description, and a Get Started button callback.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Displays a grid of project cards with images and metrics, plus a button to view the full portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders three service cards with icons and descriptions, along with a button to explore services.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Maps and displays client testimonial cards with quotes, authors, and company info.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling and buttons that trigger smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
Custom hook that submits a contact form through an actor, tracking submission state, success, and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode variants, brand colors, and custom gradient utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color variables, brand colors, custom animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project goals, visual requirements, features, and image assets needed for the SolviroStudio portfolio site.
